title: Can a maternal uncle be a girl's Wali for marriage, and is the Nikkah valid if this happens?
transcript: Abdullah from the U.S. Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Hasek. Walaikum Assalam. I live in the United States and I recently learned that if a girl's father passes away only her paternal uncle can be wali for her nikah and not her maternal uncles.
